title: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
subtitle: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (January 19 - February 15) will also receive:

- A Taxi to get started with Taxi Work
- White Prismatic Pearl and Dark Holographic Chameleon Paints
- The Equipment Upgrade for the Acid Lab
- Exclusive Trippy Knife Skin and Trippy Baseball Bat Skin at the Gun Van
- Exclusive items to celebrate Lunar New Year
- And more

Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for full details
